name: Dewdrop Dynasty Demo Demake Demo
description:
A fan demake of Firith Studios Goodgis' Dewdrop Dynasty Demo. Experience the successfully kickstarted metroidvania as if it were released back in 1998!

Disclaimer:

This is a free fan project allowed by Goodgis, the Master himself. Please support the original Dewdrop Dynasty on Steam.

Controls: FunctionKeyboard [Web]Consoles [GBC]Interact [Talk]W / Up Arrow KeyDirectional Button [UP]MovementA, S / Left and Right Arrow KeysDirectional Button [LEFT]
Directional Button [RIGHT]Jump
Confirm Selections
K, Z and [Spacebar]A ButtonShoot [with Gun]X, JB ButtonInventoryI, EnterStart ButtonMapL, ShiftSelect ButtonShoot Upward[HOLD Up + Shoot][HOLD Up + Shoot]Gun Jump[Double tap Jump][Double tap Jump]Reload Gun[Shoot Button when no Ammo][Shoot Button when no Ammo]Roll [I-Frames][HOLD Down + Jump][HOLD Down + Jump]Crawl [Upgrade]Interact ButtonInteract Button What's different?
  • Pixel art remade for the GameBoy Color Screen
  • The whole demo is explorable!
  • Controls revamped for GameBoy Color Hardwares and Emulators
  • New enemies and Bosses
  • Additional Collectibles for Completionists
  • Cameos from other games and franchises; Wink as a hidden enemy type in-game, Blitz as a secret optional Boss, and a surprise End Boss.
  • and more!
Featuring Sound Effects and Music catered for the GameBoy by:
  • Coffee Bat
  • AJ Booker
  • TipTopTomCat
  • Mr. V
Special Thanks to:
  • Goodgis for allowing me to demake the demo
  • Hauntology for the Platformer Plus Plugin [used in engine]
  • Max Oakland for letting me use Wink for a Cameo
  • Team Cherry and You!

Made with GB Studio by Chris Maltby
